mappings.description: A list of material to variant mappings
mappings.gltf_detailedDescription: An array of object values that associate an indexed material to a set of variants.

variants.description: An array of variant index values.
variants.gltf_detailedDescription: An array of index values that reference variants defined in the glTF root's extension object.

material.description: The material associated with the set of variants.
material.gltf_detailedDescription: A reference to the material associated with the given array of variants.

name.description: The user-defined name of this variant material mapping.
name.gltf_detailedDescription: The optional user-defined name of this variant material mapping.  This is not necessarily unique.
